commands.name: setup
commands.description: Guided wizard: harden host + install OpenClaw (default)

commands.name: deploy
commands.description: Force full deployment even if already installed

commands.name: scan
commands.description: Read-only security audit (no changes, just a report)

commands.name: uninstall
commands.description: Securely remove OpenClaw and wipe sensitive data

flags.description: Don't prompt for fixes (same as scan)

agentSubcommands.name: --install
agentSubcommands.description: Configure API key and install scheduled scans

deploymentModes.name: native
deploymentModes.description: Run OpenClaw directly via npm — simpler

deploymentModes.name: docker
deploymentModes.description: Run OpenClaw in Docker — better isolation (recommended)
